item.title: Magnitude 7.3 earthquake causes widespread damage in Pacific island nation of Vanuatu
item.description: A powerful magnitude 7.3 earthquake has struck just off the coast of Vanuatu, causing widespread destruction in the South Pacific island nation

item.title: Drone updates: No national security risk found after 5,000 FBI tips
item.description: The FBI has received more than 5,000 tips in the last few weeks about drone sightings in New Jersey and other states, said the joint statement.
